sentences.en: a picturesque account of his trip to New York
sentences.cn: 对他纽约之行绘声绘色的描述

sentences.en: a picturesque description of life at sea
sentences.cn: 对海上生活生动的描述

sentences.en: a quiet fishing village with a picturesque harbour
sentences.cn: 拥有一座美丽港口的宁静渔村

sentences.en: Alte, in the hills northwest of Loule, is the Algarve's most picturesque village.
sentences.cn: 位于洛莱西北部山区的阿尔特，是阿尔加维风景最美丽的村庄。

sentences.en: Exoticism in music, painting, and literature evokes the picturesque atmosphere and color of far - off lands.
sentences.cn: 在音乐 、 绘画和文学中的异国情调显现出遥远国度里别致的气氛与色彩.

sentences.en: In England people who are picturesque and violent cause embarrassment and are not much liked.
sentences.cn: 在英国,外貌惊人,性格粗暴的人使人不安,惹人讨厌.

sentences.en: It'suggests no crystal waters , no picturesque shores, no sublimity.
sentences.cn: 这决不会叫人联想到晶莹的清水, 如画的两岸, 雄壮的气势.

sentences.en: Its patrician dignity was a picturesque sham.
sentences.cn: 它的贵族的尊严只是一套华丽的伪装.

sentences.en: Last night the scenery was striking and picturesque.
On this much - desired spot outside the town rose a picturesque building.
sentences.cn: 座落在城外的这个人们极其向往的地方矗立着一座别具一格的建筑.

sentences.en: Seeing films makes their lives picturesque.
sentences.cn: 看电影使他们的生活丰富多彩.

sentences.en: She tried to look picturesque, but only succeeded in being untidy.
sentences.cn: 她想使自己显得美艳入画, 结果却叫人感到她衣冠不整.
这地方风景如画, 十分幽静.

sentences.en: The scene was rural and picturesque, very peaceful.
sentences.cn: 这景色充满着田园味,幽雅恬静, 秀美如画.

sentences.en: This is a picturesque front here.
sentences.cn: 这里倒是个有趣的前线.

sentences.en: We came to a picturesque cottage.
sentences.cn: 我们来到一座风景如画的村落.

sentences.en: You can see the picturesque shores beside the river.
sentences.cn: 在河边你可以看到景色如画的两岸.

words.tran_cn: 照片，图画；影片；景色；化身
独特的；生动的；别致的；图画般的

trans.tran_cn: 美丽的，别致的，生动的，奇特的，独创的
trans.tran_en: a picturesque place is pretty and interesting in an old-fashioned way
